title: "City 371"
marks: Sigature, Title, and Mark bottom margin LRC, in pencil: [Risaburo Kimura]; b
description: abstract cityscape with orange sky; purple skyline: orange, green, blue, black, and white squares define buildings and abstract urban forms; blue column rises at center with orange, purple, and black zigzags, green ladder-like pattern, and black lines; blue column continues with black, white, and purple lines leading to hollow blue square and filled askew blue square with small orange square at top; angled dotted blue line with angled green, black, purple, and white solid lines across top and blue column; other geometric forms within purple and orange background at bottom
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Harvey Gross via the Morikami Museum and Japanese Gardens
